performance_at_interview_what_to_improve: Responses lacked the knowledge and understanding of the current priorities within your chosen subject.  Research the National Curriculum and assessment, behaviour management strategies and the various ways in which pupils learn.  Extend answers to show more depth and understanding of the questions.  Develop teacher presence, use of voice to engage and enthuse young learners, so that it will be evident that you can engage children and exhibit the necessary authority and presence.
honesty_and_professionalism_other_reason: Ensure dress code is appropriate for the professional context.
